title: National Regeneration Movement | political party, Mexico
snippet: Founded in 2014 by Mexican politician Andrés Manuel López Obrador, it stresses an anti-corruption agenda, supports energy nationalism, and advocates policies traditionally associated with left-wing ideologies in Latin America.

title: Morena (political party) - Wikipedia
snippet: On 10 January 2011, López Obrador, drawing from his successful mobilization of activists during the "National Movement in Defense of Oil, Heritage, and the Popular Economy," announced the creation of a new social and political organization aimed at defending the vote ahead of the 2012 general ...

title: National Regeneration Movement | Historica Wiki | Fandom
snippet: The National Regeneration Movement (MORENA) is a social democratic political party in Mexico which was founded in 2014 by Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador. The party originated as a nonprofit organization founded in 2012 to support Lopez Obrador's ...

title: National Regeneration Movement – Acervo Lima
snippet: The party’s acronym , morena , alludes to “Virgem morena”, that is, to Nossa Senhora de Guadalupe , a Marian apparition with a dark complexion who is the patron saint of Mexico. The National Regeneration Movement was founded by Andrés Manuel López Obrador as a civil society organization ...
